text: “Kwa Iye ndiko kuli (kuvomera) pempho lachoonadi. Ndipo aja amene akupempha mafano kusiya Iye (Allah), sawayankha pa chilichonse koma (chikhalidwe chawo) chili ngati yemwe akutambasulira madzi manja ake awiri kuti afike m’kamwa mwake; koma sangafike. Ndipo mapemphero a osakhulupirira sali kanthu koma ndi otaika basi (opita pachabe)
